artiano.neural.learning

类 LevenbergMarquardtLearning

  • java.lang.Object
    • artiano.neural.learning.LevenbergMarquardtLearning
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    SupervisedLearning

    public class LevenbergMarquardtLearning
extends java.lang.Object
implements SupervisedLearning

    Description: Implementation of Levenberg-Marquart learning algorithm

    从以下版本开始:
    1.0.0
    版本:
    1.0.0
    作者:
    Nano.Michael, (latest modification by Nano.Michael)

        protected double computeJacobian(Matrix[] inputs,
                     Matrix[] targetOutputs)
        compute the jacobian matrix
        参数:

        targetOutputs - - outputs of a block
        返回:
        - sum of squared errors

        参数:

        targetOutputs - labels of target output
        返回:
        error term
